timeline.message: fix proxy not working with methods expecting other CDateSet
Apply usage of CDateSetCache where it makes sense
dont query size if we are not interested
remove logging as that was causing slowdown

timeline.bodyText: container kann in die While-Schleife um den Scope zu verkleinern.
timeline.author: thoniTUB

timeline.bodyText: Du kannst hier return BitMapCDateSet.create(CDateRange.of(start, end)); machen. Das of kann mit null umgehen, so wie ich das sehe.
timeline.author: thoniTUB
